blog.name: wordscorrupt
blog.title: Iron Dad All Day Every Day
blog.description: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers and Peter Parker have taken over my life. I write stories and then cry over them.

summary: When peter was a little kid he was kidnapped by some villain that made him his sidekick so a cuple years later when peter is 12,...
question: When peter was a little kid he was kidnapped by some villain that made him his sidekick so a cuple years later when peter is 12,  the villain say that today ironman will come to visit them so when ironman arived the villain tell peter to hide after ironman and the villain fight its end up with the villain dead (kill himself) peter saw this and get out of his hide place and try to fight tony bc he think tony killed the villain  tony stop him easliy and clam him down until peter fell asleep on him
answer:
Oh my lord, this is such an amazing idea!

So I imagine that Tony’s just about ready to pack up the evidence that he needs and destroy all of this guys’s work (apparently this guy was part of
Hydra, but tended to work solo and was rather into building bombs and other weapons) when in a split second he hears a shuffle followed by someone throwing themselves onto his back and he feels a knife to his throat.

It doesn’t take long for Tony to throw the person off their shoulders and only when he turns around, pointing his thruster at them and ready to blow them
to pieces does he come face to face with a tiny, scared child. Was Hydra training child soldiers or something? But this kid was scrawny (by the looks of
it a small gust of wind would easily topple him over) and bruises marred his face while rags hung off him small frame. If anything he looked more like a
captive.

“What?”

“You killed him!”


The kid throws himself at Tony once more and tries to stab him through the armor.

Tony easily takes the knife away and throws it back before wrapping his arms around the child. Peter struggles in his arms and Tony tries to calm him down.

“Easy kid. No one’s gonna hurt you.”

“You hurt him! You killed him!”

“Because he was a bad guy!”

“No you’re the bad guy! He said so!”

Tony just huffs, but wraps his arm tighter around the kid, mostly to keep the kid from hurting himself from thrashing around. It doesn’t take long for the kid to start crying and begging Tony not to hurt him. Not to take him away again.

“Did this man take you away from your family?” When Peter nods, Tony’s horrified at the thought of what this child might have endured under this man’s
care.

Peter’s has stopped thrashing around at this point and is just limp in Tony’s arms, crying silently. Tony gets a better look at him, seeing the scars, cuts
and bruises around his face. He’s positive he’d find the same injuries all over his body too.

Tony doesn’t know why, but he has a sudden need to protect this kid. More so th an any of the other kids he saved. He loosens up his arms, but brings Peter
in closer to his chest, trying to convey as much comfort and warmth he can through the suit. It’d be better for him to hold the kid in his actual arms,
but he’s still not sure if this is all one elaborate trap.

“Shh, I’m gonna take you, but somewhere safe and then we can find your parents, okay?”

At this point Peter has just accepted the fact that this man now had control over him and whether or not what he was saying was true, it didn’t matter
because Peter was never going to be strong enough to escape from Iron Man’s hold, similar to how he couldn’t escape from the man who kidnapped him.

Tony carries Peter in his arms as he flies out of there. He has no idea what he kind of situation he just put himself in with this kid, but the sudden need
to take care of this boy washes away any doubts he has.

summary: That "not" in the last ask was supposed to be "bot," autocorrect changed it lol. What do you have for how the bots react to baby...
question: That "not" in the last ask was supposed to be "bot," autocorrect changed it lol. What do you have for how the bots react to baby Morgan Stark, or Pepper when she's pregnant? What do they do when they meet Peter for the first time? How do they react to Peter on the ceiling, Peter holding baby Morgan? Does Peter make a little web hammock to rock Morgan to sleep when he's babysitting?
answer:
Me and @the-faultofdaedalus have talked extensively about Stark babies (not morgan in particular, OCs, sisters) so I can transfer that over to Morgan if you’d like. Which is the bots “refer” to Morgan as their (Morgan would be a girl in this case) “squishy sister” and Tony would make them wear padding so baby doesn’t get hurt around their sharp edges. Tony also has a heart attack looking at his very human, vulnerable infant and watching her be carried around by a bot he’s nicknamed “butterfingers” for years but it’s fine. She’s fine. They’re careful with fragile squishy sibling.

Peters a bit of a different story, he’s squishy, sure, but he’s also big and strong. The bots think that they’re still stronger than he is (and have protective tendencies) until peter, in a panic to look for his other tennis shoe, picks DUM-E up one handed. They now huddle around him whenever he comes, begging to be picked up like little kids. (Which Morgan join in when she’s old enough to. Peter holds her as he walks on the ceiling. Cue bot jealously. Cue tony having another heart attack watching peter balance both the bots and Morgan upside down.)

The bots don’t really understand what pregnancy is. Like, perhaps, they understand Tony and Pepper are “building” something (the best way Tony could describe it.) But they understood that Pepper was working hard, and her body was changing. Eventually they start doting on her. Bringing her water and blankets even though they don’t really understand. And she makes sure to thank them properly.

summary: Pepper: So, how have you been? Tony: Fine. Except for this headache. Comes and goes. Bucky: [Appears] Tony: Oh look, there it...
body:
Pepper: So, how have you been?

Tony: Fine. Except for this headache. Comes and goes.

Bucky: [Appears]

Tony: Oh look, there it is.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Peter’s Secrets Revealed
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2USAUEg

by ShadowQuill

Peter’s day doesn’t start of great. He’s almost late to school, had to take his dad’s car, and his school is attacked. Yeah, Green Goblin decides to come to Peter’s school and demand Peter Parker. In order to save everyone Peter has to reveal his biggest secret, he’s dating Wade Wilson.

Wait wrong secret, he’s Spider-Man.

He really hopes his family, the Avengers, won’t hate him.

Words: 1161, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Peter’s Secrets

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Iron Man (Movies), Spider-Man - All Media Types, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M, M/M

by ShadowQuill

Peter’s day doesn’t start of great. He’s almost late to school, had to take his dad’s car, and his school is attacked. Yeah, Green Goblin decides to come to Peter’s school and demand Peter Parker. In order to save everyone Peter has to reveal his biggest secret, he’s dating Wade Wilson.

Wait wrong secret, he’s Spider-Man.

He really hopes his family, the Avengers, won’t hate him.

Follow me on Twitter @drstrangefanask

summary: My personal conclusion after Infinity War about Tony and Steve.
body:
My personal conclusion after Infinity War about Tony and Steve.

Tony didn’t change even after all his movies, he found out the truth and got mental health issues because of all the shit he went through. He was always a cinnamon roll, always a good person. That’s why he suffers so much. He’s like Peter, kind to the core since the start, but who still needs to mature so they can see beyond the world’s corruption. They’re naive, upset at the world’s rotteness, struggling to make it better. Even during his party days, Tony had no idea of how the world could be cruel, he was cruel himself many times but without realizing it, maybe because his father was so harsh to him, made him believe world is pain, but still, he hadn’t met true intense pain yet.

That’s why Tony and Stephen are so different. Stephen knew all the shit he was doing, he didn’t care. He was selfish and he already knew the world, he was part of the cold world Tony and Peter try to change. Stephen, unlike Tony, he changed in essence. He reached a new level of not caring about himself anymore, 100% of his self belongs to his mission, and it’s absolutely selfless.

That’s why Stephen sounds more mature and stable than Tony in Infinity War, Tony didn’t change his own core like Stephen had to, Tony never needed to change, he needed to see the truth and mature, learn how to play among the devils of the world.

The proof is that Tony decided to stop producing weapons the exact moment he found out the truth. The same goes for Steve Rogers, he was always good, that’s why he was chosen in the first place, he also doesn’t have to change and he didn’t.

We watched pure, good characters like Tony and Steve to get more and more wounded by the cruel world they keep trying to change, and in Endgame we’ll see the closing of all those consequences.

summary: Watching Civil War with friend and her mom, and we got to Tony's grant speech
title: Watching Civil War with friend and her mom, and we got to Tony's grant speech
body:
Friend's Mom: How are they determining which of those projects get funded? Some of them must be terrible ideas.
Me: ...Tony presumes that by going to MIT, he's already weeded out 90% of the bad ideas, and has now given the true creatives room to play. 
Friend's Mom: But you still need some way of deciding how much which ones are worth, to spend money on, and not be indiscriminate about it, if you're gonna get good results. 
Friend: Well, knowing Tony, this isn't so much about sparking creativity as it is about guilt, and he has the money to throw away, and frequently does when he feels guilty. 
Me: So he doesn't really care. 
Friend: Right. 
Friend's Mom: But he could be funding a villain!
Me: Ooh, I want a fanfic where one of those kids becomes a supervillain because of this program. 
Friend: YES.
Me: It wouldn't even be an AU, it's just really plausible. And the others would all stare at him like 'You made a supervillain AGAIN.'

summary: Flight of the Navigator - Chapter 1 - arachnapete - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
title: Flight of the Navigator - Chapter 1 - arachnapete - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 2/?
Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Iron Man (Movies)
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Michelle Jones & Ned Leeds & Peter Parker, Harley Keener & Peter Parker, Peter Parker & Flash Thompson, Peter Parker & Tony Stark & Stephen Strange, Peter Parker & Stephen Strange, Harley Keener & Peter Parker & Tony Stark, May Parker (Spider-Man) & Tony Stark, May Parker (Spider-Man) & Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Ben Parker & May Parker (Spider-Man), Harley Keener & Tony Stark, Harley Keener & Peter Parker & Tony Stark & Stephen Strange, Peter Parker & Avengers Team, Tony Stark & Avengers Team, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Michelle Jones/Peter Parker, Harley Keener & Avengers Team, Shuri & T'Challa (Marvel), Harley Keener & Peter Parker & Shuri, Peter Parker & Shuri, Harley Keener & Shuri
Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Harley Keener, May Parker (Spider-Man), Michelle Jones, Ned Leeds, Flash Thompson, Ben Parker, Carnage Symbiote (Marvel), Pepper Potts, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, James Rhodes, Happy Hogan, Harley Keener’s Sister, Harley Keener’s Mother, Stephen Strange, Wong (Marvel), James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Thor (Marvel), Loki (Marvel), Shuri (Marvel), T'Challa (Marvel), Clint Barton, Sam Wilson (Marvel), Wanda Maximoff, Vision (Marvel), Rocket Raccoon, Peter Quill, Gamora (Marvel), Thanos (Marvel), Drax the Destroyer, Mantis (Marvel), Groot (Marvel), Scott Lang, Hope Van Dyne, Hank Pym, Janet Van Dyne
Additional Tags: Tony Stark Has A Heart, Protective Tony Stark, Irondad, Precious Peter Parker
Series: Part 3 of Carry On, My Friend.
Summary:

They both continued to talk in hushed voices until it was rearing close time. Which, by the way, was still pretty late. It was around two a.m. when the barista told both men they were closing up shop, Strange opened up a portal to the compound, allowing passage for Tony. “Stark. They’ll both be okay. We’ll get to the bottom of this.”

“Thanks Doc. But it seems I’m rather known for being an overstresser.”

“Well, don’t be. They don’t need overstressed, cooped up in his lab all day Tony Stark. They need their dad.”

“I’m not their—"

Stephen promptly pushed him through the portal and opened up another leading him back home.
***
And by the end of it, Harley was crying. He was doing a lot of that these days. Crying.
And Harley Keener was not a cry-er.
Except he was.
***
(PLEASE PLEASE READ AUTHORS NOTES BEFORE READING)

blog.name: spidernerd26
blog.title: Spider Nerds Unite!
blog.description: Just some posts about our favorite friendly neighborhood web head! Feel free to ask questions or give suggestions!

summary: Peter and the rest of the Avengers are hanging out in a common area. Bruce and Hulk are at odds so during this particular time...
body:
Peter and the rest of the Avengers are hanging out in a common area. Bruce and Hulk are at odds so during this particular time Hulk is in control.

Hulk: * doesn’t notice Peter and almost sits on him*

Peter: Woah! Careful there mean green machine, you almost made me into a Spidey flapjack!

Hulk: OH HULK SORRY! HE NEVER WANTS TO HURT PUNY PARKER!

Peter: Easy on the puny. I’ve gained a lot of muscle lately for your information.

Clint: Taco weight doesn’t count.

Hulk: BUT PARKER IS SO TINY! HE LIKE BABY DUCKLING THAT NEED PROTECTED!

Peter: I can pick up a bus!

Loki: While crying.

Hulk: HULK MUST PROTECT PARKER BY TEACHING HIM TO BECOME BIG STRONG MAN!

Peter: I am a man! Right Mr.Stark?

Tony: Pete you told me you couldn’t go to Germany because of homework.

Peter: Thor you think I’m a man.

Thor: *places hand on Peter’s shoulder * I think you will become a very noble man one day.

Peter: Ugh! Fine I know who to call! *punches in phone number * Hey aunt May, I’m a man right?

May: Of course!

Peter: Someone finally understands that I am…

May: You’ve always been my little man!

Clint: *snorts *

Peter: grrbblewerahhh!!!

summary: “I shouldn't be alive unless it was for a reason. I'm not crazy, Pepper. I just finally know what I have to do. And I know in my...
caption: “I shouldn’t be alive unless it was for a reason. I’m not crazy, Pepper. I just finally know what I have to do. And I know in my heart that it’s right.”
